mapper.select: SELECT e.*, tdi.*, u.ubig_id, u.ubig_cod_dpto || u.ubig_cod_prov || u.ubig_cod_dist AS ubig_codigo, u.ubig_departamento, u.ubig_provincia, u.ubig_distrito, p.*, s.sucu_id, s.sucu_direccion, s.sucu_urbanizacion, s.sucu_status, us.ubig_id AS sucu_ubig_id, us.ubig_cod_dpto || us.ubig_cod_prov || us.ubig_cod_dist AS sucu_ubig_codigo, us.ubig_departamento AS sucu_ubig_departamento, us.ubig_provincia AS sucu_ubig_provincia, us.ubig_distrito AS sucu_ubig_distrito, ps.pais_codigo AS sucu_pais_codigo, ps.pais_nombre AS sucu_pais_nombre FROM sunqubit.contribuyentes AS e INNER JOIN sunqubit.tipos_documentos_identidad AS tdi ON tdi.tiid_codigo = e.tiid_codigo LEFT JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS u ON u.ubig_id = e.ubig_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.paises AS p ON p.pais_codigo = e.pais_codigo LEFT JOIN sunqubit.sucursales AS s ON s.cont_id = e.cont_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS us ON us.ubig_id = s.ubig_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.paises AS ps ON ps.pais_codigo = s.pais_codigo WHERE e.cont_id = #{contId};
